original_text: “‘Cursed be anyone who dishonors his father or his mother.’ And all the people shall say, ‘Amen.’
korean_text: 그의 부모를 경홀히 여기는 자는 저주를 받을 것이라 할 것이요 모든 백성은 아멘 할지니라

sentences.original_text: ‘Cursed be anyone who dishonors his father or his mother.’
sentences.korean_translation: ‘자기 아버지나 어머니를 공경하지 않는 자는 저주를 받을지니라.’

sentences.original_text: And all the people shall say, ‘Amen.’
